entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
